Squizzy::

She watched as Zardus left. She turned her attention to 
LadyHawk.  "What are you going to show me and may I be of any help in 
your experiment?" She said in a cheerful voice.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Reptilica/Zardus::
> 
> The shuttle flies into the clearing containing the Alliance bace, 
landing and 
> opening the hatch. Inside, Reptilica nervioustly stands up, walking 
toward 
> the exit.
> 
> "We're here," he says, looking outside.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zardus frowns as he recieves Wheeljack's transmission, looking at 
Squizzy in 
> surprize as he hears her question.
> 
> "No, she's not. She's a visiting scientist, here to demonstrate an 
> experiment. Stay here and overlook her work, see if its worthwhile 
for us," 
> he says, "I've got something to take care of."
> 
> He walks out of the room, heading for the entrance. "I'll meet you 
and the 
> probe at the entrance, Wheeljack," he says over his comm to 
Wheeljack.
